p: Moxifloxacin ( Table 4, Compound 18) and ciprofloxacin ( Table 4, Compound 19), unsaturated β-amino acid heterocycles, are highly active fluoroquinolones containing a β-amino acid moiety, which are used in the treatment of community-acquired pneumonia caused by Chlamydia pneumoniae and chronic prostatitis caused by Chlamydia trachomatis, respectively [ 54, 55].
